Class SensorUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.SensorUtils

public class SensorUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes utility methods for interacting with sensors

Method Detail

convertVoltageToTemp

public static float convertVoltageToTemp(float voltage,
                                         int sensorType,
                                         int scale)
convert a voltage to a temperature

Parameters:
voltage - the voltage reading
sensorType - the type of sensor used, one of the constants defined by this class
scale - the temperature scale to use, one of the constants defined the UnitConversionUtils class
Returns:
the temperature as derived from the voltage reading

convertVoltageToRelativeHumidity

public static float convertVoltageToRelativeHumidity(float voltage,
                                                     int sensorType)
convert a voltage to a relative humidity

Parameters:
voltage - the voltage from the sensor
sensorType - the type of sensor used, one of the constants define by this class
Returns:
the relative humidity derived from the voltage reading

adjustRelativeHumidity

public static float adjustRelativeHumidity(float relativeHumidity,
                                           float temperature,
                                           int sensorType)
adjust the relative humidity to take into account the current temperature

Parameters:
relativeHumidity - the relative humidity
temperature - the current temperature
sensorType - the type of sensor used, one of the constants define by this class
Returns:
the adjusted relative humidity value

barometricTrendAsString

public static java.lang.String barometricTrendAsString(int barometricTrend,
                                                       int weatherStationType,
                                                       android.content.Context context)
convert the barometric trend value into a string representation

Parameters:
barometricTrend - the numeric barometric trend value
weatherStationType - the weather station identifier, one of the constants defined in this class
context - a context object used to retrieve the appropriate string
Returns:
the barometric trend as a string
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the weather station type is invalid

Parameters:

context - a context object used to retrieve the appropriate string
Returns:
the wind direction as a string
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the windDirection is invalid

convertRainClicksToMillimeters

public static float convertRainClicksToMillimeters(int rainClicks,
                                                   int weatherStationType)
convert a rain click value into mm

Parameters:
rainClicks - the number of rain clicks
weatherStationType - the weather station type
Returns:
the amount of rain in millimeters
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the weather station type is invalid

parseWeatherRecord

public static WeatherReading parseWeatherRecord(byte[] bytes,
                                                int weatherStationType)
                                         throws SensorUtilsException
parse a binary weather record into a WeatherReading object

Parameters:
bytes - an array of bytes to parse
weatherStationType - the weather station type
Returns:
a populated weather record, with a timestamp of the current time
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the weatherStationType does not validate
SensorUtilsException - if an error occurs during the parsing of the record

byteArrayToHexString

convert a byte array into its hex string representation

Parameters:
bytes - an array of bytes
Returns:
the byte array as a string of hex digits
